paper_abstract: The preparation of highly functionalized pyrrolidines by a tandem Staudinger/aza-Wittig/ Ugi Three-Component Reaction (SAWU-3CR) is presented. The SAWU-3CR was applied on two different carbohydrate derived 4-azidopentanals and two libraries of chemically diverse products were prepared.
paper_title: Transformation of carbohydrate derived 4-azidopentanals into highly functionalized pyrrolidines Via a tandem Staudinger/aza-Wittig/Ugi multicomponent reaction
